body.name: Plum Gator 7 4G Volte Unlocked Rugged Smart Phone Military Grade IP69 Water Shock Proof 5580 mAh Battery - Black
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 13 hrs 40 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 40 mins
features: 【4G VoLTE & Factory Unlocked】NOTE: This device is compatible with ATT, Tmobile, Speed Talk, Consumer Cellular, Mint, Ting - NOT COMPATIBLE WITH VERIZON, STRAIGHT TALK OR BOOST

【IP69 Waterproof, Shockproof and Dustproof】The Gator 7 is made of shock-resistant material, a 5.7” HD+ Corning Gorilla glass 3 screen with a surrounding rubber frame. The Gator 7 meets the highest standard of waterproofing and is IP69 certified.

【NFC Feature & Face Recognition Unlock】Built-in NFC feature provides a simple, fast and convenient way in daily life. You can get a prepaid bus pass, electronic access, credit card etc. Face unlock will help you quickly access your personal phone. These quick unlock methods make your life more convenient! Just a glance, and your identity can be recognized to unlock your phone.
【8MP + 5MP Dual Camera】The Gator 7 is equipped with a 8MP rear camera that is set to capture great moments and a face-fronting 5MP camera with exquisite selfies.

【Android 11 & 3GB + 32GB ROM】The Gator 7 rugged unlocked android phone is packed with MT6761 processor to offer fast and fluent handling speed. This enables you to run multitasks, watch movies, and play demanding games smoothly. The 3GB + 32GB internal storage can totally satisfy your daily use, store the files, images, music you want, while 128GB storage expansion supported will greatly improve the storage space. (SD card not included)

【5580mAh Battery & GPS / Compass】Equipped with an impressive 5580mAh battery, you can enjoy more than a day of call time without any fear of losing touch with friends. The rugged smartphone hosts GPS, Glonass, and Compass functions so you never get lost.
body.description: The Gator 7 is made of shock-resistant material, a 5.7” HD+ Corning Gorilla glass 3 screen with a surrounding rubber frame. The Gator 7 meets the highest standard of waterproofing and is IP69 certified. Built-in NFC feature provides a simple, fast and convenient way in daily life. You can get a prepaid bus pass, electronic access, credit card etc. Face unlock will help you quickly access your personal phone. These quick unlock methods make your life more convenient! Just a glance, and your identity can be recognized to unlock your phone. The rugged smartphone hosts GPS, Glonass, and Compass functions so you never get lost. (SD card not included). The Gator 7 is equipped with a 8MP rear camera that is set to capture great moments and a face-fronting 5MP camera with exquisite selfies.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 3.6 3.6 out of 5 stars 225 ratings 3.6 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NOT Verizon compatible
reviews.reviewText: I really like this phone. I was surprised at the size and weight though. The screen size description is accurate but overall its larger. It does weigh 1/2 LB too. I know that's the trade off for the battery size. All things considered if it worked on Verizon's network I would have no issue toting this around all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't work with AT&T
reviews.reviewText: It's a pretty basic phone with a big battery, which is what I was looking for. I had no problems with it, actually liked it but it's not at&t competible like the description says it is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with any service
reviews.reviewText: The phone itself is durable but does not work with any phone service even the ones that say they are compatible with it do not waste your time or money not worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It ok. Rugged, yes. Minimalistic
reviews.reviewText: I bought it as a quick, cheap replacement. It's ok, but it tends to lock up and be slow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good in water and does have lots of regular features
reviews.reviewText: this phones important features like notifications on chat or even messages has just stopped even thought in settings they are all turned off. all was fine for awhile but suddenly notifications just stopped. plus i get a call when the phone rings the screen does not allow me to see the answering icons and therefore i cannot answer the call...i have to go in later and see who called and call them back. at least it still allows calls and chat and msgs...i just have to go in and see is anyone there...the notification dot no longer appears..wow. but for this cheap price i dont really to much mind all these ridiculous inconviences. i hope not many more functions begin to go away or stop working. one thing this phone takes an extra long time to charge up too. i will keep it because it water proof and shock proof and cost little of nothing compared to other phones and so far it DOES work as a phone...all this was my ignorant mistake...i finally found out that i had accidentally turned on the DO NOT DISTURB function....soon as i turned that off all notifications worked just fine....my total bad...lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The appearance is great more manly but so sturdy I don't care. I own 2
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about the phone and it looks like it does on the picture! I own 2, just in case, great quality also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not compatible with AT&T
reviews.reviewText: Phone is not compatible with AT&T. I bought it because the description said it was, but I was unable to make/receive calls. Had to return the phone and get another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Used with other's info
reviews.reviewText: Bought it knowing it was a used item, missing cover over charge port (so not waterproof) and wasn't noted that was it. Also had previous owner's info still on phone, did a factory reset.Friend ended up using it for secondary for pictures and downloaded music, never could get it to accept SIM card.

Llevo más de un mes con el en constante uso y me gusta que cumple con lo que dicen.Le ha durado bastante bien la betería y una caída normal no lo afecta para nada.Me gustó que viniera con accesorios y todo completo.Funciona bien con TELCEL y no he tenido problemas por la conexión.Lo único es que a veces se medio traba un poco, pero no es nada que estrese.
Muy buen Movil resistente a Golpes con bandeja para 2 sims para tener 2 números, Calidad precio muy bueno.
Es un buen teléfono, para uso rudo.Cumplió con mis espectativas

reviews.reviewTitle: Después de 5 meses los 2 teléfonos ya no sirven.
reviews.reviewText: Compre 2 telefonos en diciembre y justa esta semana, ambos tuvieron fallas. Uno ya no retiene la carga y exclusivamente se usa el cargador con el que vino y al otro se le puso la pantalla en negro, no se cayo o algo similar, simplemente se puso negra y ya. Totalmente decepcionada, no lo compren, no vale la pena. A parte que la cámara y almacenamiento es mucho peor de lo especificado. ¡Quiero un reembolso!
Me gustó , por qué el tiempo de pila es bastante , las aplicaciones no son lentas , lo uso en la vida diaria , tiene buen almacenamiento. Y sobre todo es muy resistente a las caídas .
